author: Tyler Kingkade
title: Domestic violence calls increase amid coronavirus lockdown, police say
description: As law enforcement confronts more domestic abuse cases, shelters for victims face new challenges brought on by the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
Reports of domestic violence increased in March in many cities around the country as the coronavirus pandemic spread, according to law enforcement officials raising concerns about families safety as they isolate at home.
